name: MOXI Museum Camp
full_name: MOXI, The Wolf Museum of Exploration + Innovation

data_hints.pricing_location: Registration portal at moxi.ticketapp.org shows pricing in Details sidebar. Member discount applied at checkout when signed in.
data_hints.hours_location: Camp hours: 9:00 AM start (implied from registration times). Extended day available as add-on.

one_day_camps.name: Cupid's Workshop: Patterns + Prints
one_day_camps.description: Create picture-perfect Valentines using patterns. Get inspired by patterns in nature, design a tessellation stamp, or use the pattern of your heartbeat to create a truly heartfelt card.

spring_break_camps.name: Intergalactic Innovators
spring_break_camps.description: Calling all space explorers! The galaxy is recruiting its newest space troop. Looking for collaborative, curious, and brave kids to help solve problems that are out of this world.

summer_camps.note: Summer registration opens March 3, 2026. Schedule image available at pages.summer_schedule_image URL.
summer_camps.typical_format: Week-long camps with themed STEAM activities

data_hints.member_pricing: Yes - MOXI Members receive discount on camps. Must sign in with membership email at checkout to see discount.

secondary.name: Veterans Memorial Building
secondary.note: Some camps held here - check individual camp listings

activities: STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Art, Math) activities
Outdoor lunch and play at local parks

daily_schedule.camp_activities: Themed STEAM activities throughout the day
daily_schedule.lunch: Off-site at local parks (Ambassador Park, Chase Palm Park, or beach)

optional: Medication in original container (staff cannot administer)

staff.supervision: CPR-certified Camp Counselors with emergency contact info, first aid kit, radios, and extra supplies

policies.behavior: MOXI does not tolerate bullying. Primary care/pick up person will be contacted for behavior issues.
policies.food: Campers bring own lunch. Lunch eaten off-site at local parks.
policies.transport: Campers escorted to parks by volunteers and CPR-certified counselors

communication.emergencies: Staff will reach out via phone

membership_tiers.note: Members receive camp discounts. Must sign in with membership email at checkout.

tiers.name: Family
tiers.includes: 2 Named Adults + Named Children (17 and under, in household)

tiers.name: Family +1
tiers.includes: 2 Named Adults + Named Children + 1 Named Caregiver/Grandparent

tiers.name: Family +2
tiers.includes: 2 Named Adults + Named Children + 2 Named Caregivers/Grandparents

tiers.name: Explorer
tiers.includes: All membership benefits + 2 additional guests per visit + 4 guest passes

tiers.name: Donor
tiers.includes: All membership benefits + exclusive events + recognition

membership_tiers.camp_benefit: Savings on Camps, Special Events, and MOXI Birthday Packages

admission.ebt_cardholders: $3 per member of household (up to 4 guests)

registration.member_discount_note: Sign in with membership email at checkout to see discount

site_structure.page_format: Main camps page has filterable camp listings by grade and date. Registration links to ticketapp portal.

scraper_hints.camps_page_has_filters: Grade checkboxes (K-6) and Date checkboxes for filtering
scraper_hints.pricing_in_sidebar: Registration portal shows pricing in Details sidebar on right side
scraper_hints.member_pricing_at_checkout: Member pricing appears after signing in, not shown publicly
scraper_hints.summer_schedule_is_image: Summer camp schedule published as PNG image, not text

special_notes: MOXI camps are STEAM-focused with themed week-long or single-day experiences. Lunch is eaten off-site at local parks (Ambassador Park, Chase Palm Park, beach). Campers receive a camp t-shirt. Extended day is available as an add-on. Member pricing requires signing in with membership email at checkout. Summer 2026 registration opens March 3. The summer schedule is published as a PNG image. Some camps may be held at Veterans Memorial Building instead of MOXI. 16 campers per session. Staff are CPR/First Aid certified.
